code: import React from'react';import ReactEcharts from'echarts-for-react';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";var BarBasicColumnChart=function BarBasicColumnChart(){var getOption=function getOption(){return{tooltip:{trigger:'axis'},legend:{data:['Data1','Data2']},calculable:true,color:['rgba(163, 137, 212, 1)','rgba(28, 233, 181, 1)'],xAxis:[{type:'category',boundaryGap:false,data:['Monday','Tuesday','Wednesday','Thursday','Friday','Saturday','Sunday']}],yAxis:[{type:'value',axisLabel:{formatter:'{value} °C'}}],series:[{name:'Data1',type:'line',smooth:true,data:[11,11,15,13,12,13,10],markPoint:{data:[{type:'max',name:'Maximum'},{type:'min',name:'Minimum'}]},markLine:{data:[{type:'average',name:'100'}]}},{name:'Data2',type:'line',smooth:true,data:[1,-2,2,5,3,2,0],markPoint:{data:[{name:'Week Minimum',value:-2,xAxis:1,yAxis:-1.5}]},markLine:{data:[{type:'average',name:'100'}]}}]};};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ReactEcharts,{option:getOption()});};export default BarBasicColumnChart;
